title: AlgorithmX
author: AlgorithmX
content: Greetings, BitcoinTalk community!We are excited to introduce AlgorithmX (NSzabo), a smart contract based on the Ethereum blockchain that offers privacy-focused token transfers. With AlgorithmX, your token transactions are obfuscated and divided into equal parts to be sent to random addresses before reaching the final recipient.Key features of AlgorithmX:Obfuscated token transfers for enhanced privacyDivision of token amount into 10 equal parts for increased securityImplementation of security standards and auditing by AlgorithmXlabsThe AlgorithmX contract is backed by an active community of developers and auditors, committed to the security and privacy of token transactions. It also has a maximum supply limit of 230 million tokens.For more information about AlgorithmX and how to use it in your token transactions, please visit our website [website link] and refer to the technical documentation [link to technical documentation]. You can also contact us via email [team email] for any inquiries or questions.Join the revolution of private token transactions with AlgorithmX!Â Dedication"A special thanks to Nick Szabo, a pioneer in cryptography and computer security, for his inspiration in the development of AlgorithmX." BTCIt's important to note that the presentation can be customized based on your needs and the community you are posting in. Make sure to follow the rules and guidelines of the BitcoinTalk forum and provide accurate and relevant information about the AlgorithmX contract in your post.
